Cooking
■Put shrimp portions into the
basket.

Cooking
■Don't splash the
oil! Put the
basket into the
oil and press
the timer.

Cooking
■When the timer rings, pull
up the basket and cut the
oil.

Cooking
■Move portions
from basket to
UHC tray with
wire rack.

Cooking
■Put them in
UHC and push
the timer.
